safire.learning.interfaces.clamped_sampler module¶

This module contains classes that ...

class safire.learning.interfaces.clamped_sampler.MultimodalClampedSampler(model, dim_text, dim_img, heavy_debug=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class implements sampling from a model with a part of the inputs clamped to a certain value. This is a utility class for performing multimodal experiments.

It needs a model and the text and image dimensions of the multimodal dataset used with the model.

build_vhv(sample_hidden=False, sample_visible=False)[source]¶

Creates and compiles the vhv mean sampling function.

get_img_init_features(text_features)[source]¶

Returns the default image init features.

t2i_run_chain(text_features, k=1, sample_hidden=False, sample_visible=False)[source]¶

Runs the chain for K steps. Set whether to sample hidden and/or visible layer.

t2i_run_chain_mean_last(text_features, k=1)[source]¶

Runs the chain for K steps. In all steps except last, both layers are sampled. In the last step, both the hidden and visible layer use means.

t2i_step(text_features, image_init_features=None, sample_hidden=False, sample_visible=False)[source]¶

Runs the theano compiled function that implements clamped sampling with fixed text and sampled images once.

Assumes text features come first in model input.

Parameters:sample – If given, will sample hidden and visible layer instead of computing mean.
